languages.text: "Вздор! В пылу сражения ваши слуги не стали бы разбираться, кто повинен в случившемся! Достань мы оружие — и нас перебили бы так же, как этих предателей!"

traits.locale_text: "Вздор! В пылу сражения ваши слуги не стали бы разбираться, кто повинен в случившемся! Достань мы оружие — и нас перебили бы так же, как этих предателей!"

languages.text: "A ridiculous claim! In the heat of battle, your servants would not have paused to consider who was truly to blame! We would have been cut down next to the traitors if we'd so much as reached for our weapons!"
languages.original_text: "Вздор! В пылу сражения ваши слуги не стали бы разбираться, кто повинен в случившемся! Достань мы оружие — и нас перебили бы так же, как этих предателей!"

traits.locale_text: "This is ridiculous! Your servants would not be concerned about whose fault it was in the heat of battle! We would be cut down next to the traitors if we as much as reached for the weapons!"
"This is ridiculous! Your servants would not be concerned about whose fault it was in the heat of battle! We would be cut down next to the traitors if we as much as reached for the weapons!"

"A ridiculous claim! In the heat of battle, your servants would not have paused to consider who was truly to blame! We would have been cut down next to the traitors if we'd so much as reached for our weapons!"

"A ridiculous claim! In the heat of battle, your servants would not have paused to consider who was truly to blame! We would have been cut down next to the traitors if we'd so much as reached for our weapons!"

"A ridiculous claim! In the heat of battle, your servants would not have paused to consider who was truly to blame! We would have been cut down next to the traitors if we'd so much as reached for our weapons!"

languages.text: “多么荒谬的指责啊！当时的战斗非常激烈，您的仆人根本不会停手，思考谁才是真正的罪魁祸首！如果我们当时真的拿起武器加入战斗，我们恐怕早就被当成叛徒杀掉了！”
languages.original_text: "A ridiculous claim! In the heat of battle, your servants would not have paused to consider who was truly to blame! We would have been cut down next to the traitors if we'd so much as reached for our weapons!"

traits.locale_text: “多么荒谬的指责啊！当时的战斗非常激烈，您的仆人根本不会停手，思考谁才是真正的罪魁祸首！如果我们当时真的拿起武器加入战斗，我们恐怕早就被当成叛徒杀掉了！”

languages.text: «¡Es ridículo! En el fragor de la batalla, sus sirvientes no se habrían parado a pensar en quién tenía realmente la culpa. Si hubiéramos intentado sacar nuestras armas, ¡habríamos muerto junto con los traidores!».
languages.original_text: "A ridiculous claim! In the heat of battle, your servants would not have paused to consider who was truly to blame! We would have been cut down next to the traitors if we'd so much as reached for our weapons!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Es ridículo! En el fragor de la batalla, sus sirvientes no se habrían parado a pensar en quién tenía realmente la culpa. Si hubiéramos intentado sacar nuestras armas, ¡habríamos muerto junto con los traidores!».

languages.text: 「ばかげた主張だ！戦いのさなかにあっては、誰が本当に悪いのか、お前たちのしもべは考える間もなかっただろう！武器に手を伸ばしただけでも、裏切り者の隣で斬り殺されていただろう！」
languages.original_text: "A ridiculous claim! In the heat of battle, your servants would not have paused to consider who was truly to blame! We would have been cut down next to the traitors if we'd so much as reached for our weapons!"

traits.locale_text: 「ばかげた主張だ！戦いのさなかにあっては、誰が本当に悪いのか、お前たちのしもべは考える間もなかっただろう！武器に手を伸ばしただけでも、裏切り者の隣で斬り殺されていただろう！」

languages.text: "Eine lächerliche Behauptung! In der Hitze des Gefechts hätten Eure Diener nicht innegehalten, um zu erwägen, wer in Wahrheit die Schuld trägt! Wir wären neben den Verrätern niedergestreckt worden, wenn wir nur nach unseren Waffen gegriffen hätten!"
languages.original_text: "A ridiculous claim! In the heat of battle, your servants would not have paused to consider who was truly to blame! We would have been cut down next to the traitors if we'd so much as reached for our weapons!"

traits.locale_text: "Eine lächerliche Behauptung! In der Hitze des Gefechts hätten Eure Diener nicht innegehalten, um zu erwägen, wer in Wahrheit die Schuld trägt! Wir wären neben den Verrätern niedergestreckt worden, wenn wir nur nach unseren Waffen gegriffen hätten!"

languages.text: « Ne soyez pas ridicule ! Dans le feu de l'action, vos serviteurs n'auraient pas fait la différence entre nos hommes et les véritables coupables ! Si nous avions fait mine de prendre les armes, nous aurions fini comme les traîtres ! »
languages.original_text: "A ridiculous claim! In the heat of battle, your servants would not have paused to consider who was truly to blame! We would have been cut down next to the traitors if we'd so much as reached for our weapons!"

traits.locale_text: « Ne soyez pas ridicule ! Dans le feu de l'action, vos serviteurs n'auraient pas fait la différence entre nos hommes et les véritables coupables ! Si nous avions fait mine de prendre les armes, nous aurions fini comme les traîtres ! »

languages.text: "Gülünç bir iddia! Savaş sırasında hizmetkârlarınızın durup kimin gerçek suçlu olduğunu düşünecek hâli yoktu! Silahlarımıza sarıldığımız an biz de hainlerin yanında telef olurduk!"
languages.original_text: "A ridiculous claim! In the heat of battle, your servants would not have paused to consider who was truly to blame! We would have been cut down next to the traitors if we'd so much as reached for our weapons!"

traits.locale_text: "Gülünç bir iddia! Savaş sırasında hizmetkârlarınızın durup kimin gerçek suçlu olduğunu düşünecek hâli yoktu! Silahlarımıza sarıldığımız an biz de hainlerin yanında telef olurduk!"
